feed.title: Progress on bech32 for future Segwit Versions (BIP-173)

entry.title: Progress on bech32 for future Segwit Versions (BIP-173)
entry.summary: The context provided is related to a transaction done with the Aqua wallet based on Rust-Bitcoin. The user is unsure about the scriptpubkey starting with 51 and thus opens up a Github link to clarify. The email chain shows a conversation from Rusty Russell via bitcoin-dev mailing list, where he provides correct results for Accepts and Rejects for various Bitcoin wallets like c-lightning, Phoenix, and blockchain.info. The email concludes with the signature of Riccardo Casatta.
